HPI 8230 Lancia 037 Evo 1984 Safari Rally 4th Place M. Alén/I. Kivimäki

Despite debuting in 1982, Lancia did not enter its new 037 in the Safari rally until 2 years later in 1984. The Safari rally was the one rally that was never conquered by the Stratos so Lancia had high hopes for the 037. Lancia entered 2 cars in the event. The #7 car was driven by Markku Alén and they enlisted the services of local Safari rally veteran Vic Preston, Jr. specifically for the event in the #17 car.

Despite their efforts, Lancia would have to wait for their first Safari win. Alén finished in 4th, 1 hour and 6 minutes down on winner Björn Waldegård.
